Package tictactoe

Class Coordinate

  • java.lang.Object
    • tictactoe.Coordinate
  • public class Coordinate
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an immutable coordinate in a two dimensional system.
    Author:
    Tapio Malmberg

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      int x
      The X value.
      int y
      The Y value.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Coordinate​(int x, int y)
      Creates a new Coordinate at (x, y).

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean equals​(Coordinate other)
      Returns true if the coordinates have the same x and y values.
      Coordinate move​(Direction dir)
      Moves a coordinate into the given direction by one x and/or y value.
      Coordinate move​(Direction dir, int times)
      Moves a coordinate into the given direction times times.

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(Coordinate other)
        Returns true if the coordinates have the same x and y values.

      • move

        public Coordinate move​(Direction dir)
        Moves a coordinate into the given direction by one x and/or y value.
        Parameters:
        dir - the direction to move to
        Returns:
        the coordinate of the new position

      • move

        public Coordinate move​(Direction dir,
                       int times)
        Moves a coordinate into the given direction times times.
        Parameters:
        dir - the direction to move to
        times - how many steps the coordinate is moved
        Returns:
        the coordinate of the new position
